to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Re: fc installation?
body:
Nick Gawronski writes:
> Hi, going to the speakupmodified.org site it still says 6 is the most
> current release.  Where can I get the new version of fedora core 7 with
> speakup?

Nowhere, at least not yet. You can get Fedora 7 on any Fedora mirror.
The Speakup Modified Fedora isn't out yet. When it is, we'll certainly
let the list know, as we always have.

PS: There is no more Fedora Core.

_______________________________________________
